front.title: A Simple Secure Addressing Scheme for IPv6 AutoConfiguration (SSAS)

abstract.t: The purpose of this document is to address the current problem inherent with using Cryptographically Generated Addresses (CGA) [RFC3972] and introduces a new algorithm that can eliminate the cost of CGA algorithm. This algorithm also responds to the security issues (IP spoofing) exists in Privacy Extension [RFC4941] or any other documents that does not focus on local security by integrating privacy with the security.
